ygData.subject: I know you're out there
ygData.msgSnippet: We now have ~75 subscribers, yet all I see are messages from me and a couple of crazy magicky types.  What s up with that?  Please everyone jump in and
ygData.messageBody:
We now have ~75 subscribers, yet all I see are messages from me and a couple
of crazy magicky types. What's up with that? Please everyone jump in and
introduce yourself. You can role play or not, but share who your char. is and
where you often adventure. Never know who you might run into out there.

Zardoz, to submit any information or questions or topics to this forum, just
email (to bristlebane_eq@onelist.com) just like you did! It is automatically
distributed to everyone. Currently I am not monitoring/appproving each mail,
and I hope not to ever have to.

Itan, I would love to join you someday in your quest to rid Norrath of those
wretched necros. There is little that pleases me more than kicking a skelly
to bits. My land is especially infected as we have those pointy-eared inkies
running about with their boney pets.

Phoeble, Monk of Freeport, Taunter of Cutthroats.
